#anime #honkai_impact #seele #seele_vollerei #vollerei #universal_sight #universal #sight

I decided to update the scope format.
A circle has appeared with a marked range for a specific projectile, which simplifies aiming at short and medium distances.
Improved sight interface. The scopes have become more informative and at the same time do not distract from the game.
The illumination of the sight has changed. By default, green, when the scope illumination is turned on, turns red. Green is used on many maps, while red is clearly visible on snowy and light maps.
The range squares also remained, but only for a specific projectile. At the same time, when switching between shells, t...

#sight #t25 #t_25
Gunsight for the T25. In fact, this is the oldest sight I created, back in early August, so it has some quite flaws

Although there are M82 inscriptions, thhe distance lines automatically change for different shells. But let's be honest, who uses anything else than the M82 with this?
The "STAB NOT PRESENT" was originally not there, but I added it upon the passing of T25 (i. e. its stabilizer being removed)
Also, what is that one diagonal line there for? Well, nothing, I just wanted to put it there

Универсальный прицел, подходящий для всех танков.
Для установки:
1. Создайте папку "all_tanks" в папке UserSights, если таковая отсутствует.
2. Перекиньте в эту папку файл.
3. Во вкладке "Настройки" -> "Общие боевые настройки" в списке выберите прицел "sight_54"
4. ???
5. PROFIT!

CUSTOMIZABLE minimalist sight for all tanks with Violet Evergarden

How to Install:
1. Move UserSights.zip file into the War Thunder Home directory
2. Unarchive it there
3. choose rbAPDS_v5 Sight

NOTE:This sight is available for all tanks however only works best on sight with a magnification of 8x or greater. Even so gaijins wierdness doesn't guarantee that the sight will work on the tank you want so submit bug reports in comments and I will do my best to fix.

CUSTOMIZATION:
You can customize the text in the sight, to do so find the folder UserSigh...

Прицел для упреждения по истребителям и штурмовки в СБ
Линии указывают вектор и угол атаки, а нижние линии на дистанцию до цели 1км-200м

При пологом сбрасывание бомб на 400км/ч сброс на 400м по неподвижной цели

Буду рад если кто сможет сделать прицел лучше и точнее

Прицел взят у stroker63: https://live.warthunder.com/post/287594/en/

Remilia from Touhou Project Sight Green + Black

For all ground vehicles

In the file there are 2 .blk files one is green and the other is black. You can use both, or just use one.
If you have any feedback please level it down below! I do plan on making more, so I'm open to suggestions!

How to install:
1. Extract the files into /UserSights/all_tanks

Holo Sight Green + Black

For all ground vehicles

#sight #m48 #m48patton #m48a1 #m48_patton_iii #m48_patton #m_48
"Eye of the Storm" gunsight for the M48A1. I usually don't name my sights but from time to time I'll eventually do it
I, ooooh woooaaah
I, ooooh woooaaah
I, ooooh woooaaah
I...am the eye of storm!

Distance can be set for the whole shell sortiment (+coaxial MG) of the M48A1 except M313 smoke shell. Currently set distance is indicated by the arrows of the individual shells
Also, the radial "eye" lines running around the crosshair are, despite being a solely cosmetic feature, actual distance lines for the M332 APCR. ...

file.name: M48A1 Patton III Eye of the Storm Gunsight.zip
